General.Name: GCL System Integration Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: GCL System Integration Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, sales, and services of battery components, energy engineering, green energy system integration, and other related products in China and internationally. It offers component products, energy storage products, as well as PVT related products. It also provides power stations and energy storage solutions. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou, China.
